"Wake Up and Smell the Coffee" - An alarm clock that starts brewing coffee at the set time, and wakes you up with the smell of freshly brewed coffee.
"Rise and Shine" - An alarm clock that projects a personalized message onto your bedroom wall, along with a motivational quote or image to help you start your day on a positive note.
"The Early Bird Gets the Worm" - An alarm clock that plays a game or quiz to test your knowledge or skills, with the goal of being the first to answer correctly and win a prize.
"The Sleep Tracker" - An alarm clock that tracks your sleep patterns and provides personalized insights and recommendations on how to improve your sleep quality.
"The Sound Bath" - An alarm clock that plays a soothing sound bath to help you relax and wake up more naturally, without the jarring sound of a traditional alarm clock.
